Description: Limestone stela, inscribed with 2 registers of hieroglyphs, mentioning Bak-aa.
Production place: Workshop in: Abydos (based on style and content)
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Abydos (based on style and content)
Curator's comments: Published : Kitchen, Ram. Insc. Vol 2 p386 HTBM Part 9: Plate XXI E. Frood, Biographical Texts from Ramessid Egypt (Atlanta SBL 2007), no. 39. Perdu, RdE 29, p. 74.
Bibliographic references: James 1970 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 9. (Pl.21)
